titles.title: All Hail The Power Of Jesus Name

authors.author: Edward Perronet James Ellor John (adapted) Rippon

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: And crown Him crown Him, newline Crown Him crown Him, newline And crown Him Lord of all.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: All hail the pow'r of Jesus' name, newline Let angels prostrate fall, newline Let angels prostrate fall, newline Bring forth the royal diadem.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Ye chosen seed of Israel's race, newline Ye ransomed from the fall, newline Ye ransomed from the fall, newline Hail Him who saves you by His grace.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Let every kindred ev'ry tribe, newline On this terrestrial ball, newline On this terrestrial ball, newline To Him all majesty ascribe.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: O that with yonder sacred throng, newline We at His feet may fall, newline We at His feet may fall, newline We'll join the everlasting song.
